name: weavescope-probe
description:
**Monitoring, visualisation & management for Docker**

This package only provides Scope probe, you will aslo need to install `weavescope` package which provides the UI app.
postInstallNotes:
Have fun monitoring, visualising and managing you containers with Weave Scope!

You still need to isntall the `weavescope` package and scale the probes to number of slaves you have in your cluster.
